note/2009

I’ve added RSS feed generation to the site building script. It’s really simple, because it only shows the 10 newest pages. This news stream here isn’t a proper collection of documents yet, so I haven’t hooked it into the RSS feed. Just the newest documents, as they are added. Look for it in Follow .
